heading: HB03082
0: AN ACT REQUIRING EVERY MAJOR BUSINESS ESTABLISHMENT LOCATED IN CENTRAL OR CORE BUSINESS DISTRICT AREA, ON COMPULSORY BASIS, TO INSTALL IN ITS PLACE OF BUSINESS OPERATION, A CLOSED CIRCUIT TELEVISION CAMERA AND EVERY MINOR BUSINESS ESTABLISHMENT, ON OPTIONAL BASIS AND PRESCRIBING EFFECTIVE GUIDELINES THEREFOR
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY since 2016-08-24
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03082
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REQUIRING EVERY MAJOR BUSINESS ESTABLISHMENT LOCATED IN CENTRAL OR CORE BUSINESS DISTRICT AREA, ON COMPULSORY BASIS, TO INSTALL IN ITS PLACE OF BUSINESS OPERATION, A CLOSED CIRCUIT TELEVISION CAMERA AND EVERY MINOR BUSINESS ESTABLISHMENT, ON OPTIONAL BASIS AND PRESCRIBING EFFECTIVE GUIDELINES THEREFOR
